WorkItem.Description:
I've not some hugely abnormal DPS gains from % damage boss debuffs when testing the latest source warlock modules.
Curse of shadows alone is bumping DPS up from 1844 to 2213, stack Imp. CoS and Misery and it goes up to 2557.
These are easily visible as being incorrect, most likely a monday error somewhere in the math.

Comments.Message: Testing back further this occurs in b12 and b12.1 also

Seems that is doubling the bonus. Maybe is taking BonusShadowSpellPowerMultiplier and BonusSpellPowerMultiplier and adding them.

Like, 10% from SpellPower for CoS, and 10% for ShadowSpellPower from CoS. Total, 20%.

1844 x 1.2 = 2212.8

I can't imagine where your numbers for CoS and Misery came from. Doubling them (supossing CoS with malediction) is 13+13+5+5, 36%, but 1844 x 1.36 is 2507.84. Too far from 2557.
Another thing i noted while thinking about this is that the warlock module does not have Shadow Weaving.
CBennight, you still around? Haven't seen any warlock updates in a while. :(
Still exists in 14 and 14.1.  Even worse now with shadow weaving.
Arnath is just starting on Rawr.Warlock, and trying to fix all its bugs. Give him some time. :)
